caption.title: Maps and sequences related to EBOV.
caption.p: A)Vector Map: pCMV Ebola GP. Mammalian Expression Vectors, ampicilin and neomycin resistance, CMV promoter and primers EBOV1, EBOV2, EBOV3, EBOV4, EBOV5 and EBOV6. B) Amino acid sequence alignment from EBOV GenBank 1976â€“2014 (GP Protein).
